name: 2-1-1 Bay Area
description: Free 24/7 referral to food, housing, legal help, health care, and more
fullDescription: 2-1-1 Bay Area is a free, confidential helpline connecting residents to essential community services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, in over 180 languages.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free 24/7 helpline (dial 2-1-1)
- Referrals to food assistance programs
- Housing and shelter resources
- Legal help connections
- Health care navigation
- Utility assistance referrals
howToGetIt:
1. Dial 2-1-1 from any phone
2. Or visit 211bayarea.org
3. Speak with trained specialist
4. Describe your needs
5. Receive personalized referrals
6. Follow up on resources provided
keywords: 211, 2-1-1, helpline, referral, social services, housing, food, health care, utility assistance, free hotline, 24/7
